data.message:
Add some more Python -> Python3 conversions

This fixes an error ('dict' object has no attribute 'itervalues') and a
warning (about safe_load) when running on Python 3 (ROS Noetic).

data.author: Daniel Bargmann
data.message: added argparse option to change publishing rate

data.author: Martin Günther
data.message:
Add missing frame_editor import namespaces

These missing namespaces caused errors in Python 3 (ROS Noetic).

This commit makes frame_editor work on Noetic. Also tested that it still
works on Kinetic.

data.author: Martin Günther
data.message:
Add missing dependency on qt_gui_py_common

This fixes the following error on Noetic:

    RosPluginProvider.load(frame_editor/Frame Editor) exception raised in __builtin__.__import__(frame_editor.rqt_editor, [FrameEditorGUI]):
    Traceback (most recent call last):
      File "/opt/ros/noetic/lib/python3/dist-packages/rqt_gui/ros_plugin_provider.py", line 79, in load
        module = __builtin__.__import__(
      File "[...]/rqt_frame_editor_plugin/frame_editor/src/frame_editor/rqt_editor.py", line 11, in <module>
        from qt_gui_py_common.worker_thread import WorkerThread
    ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'qt_gui_py_common'
